name: Sky Lines - Puzzle Game
description:
Match what you see in the sky on the board. Drag the lines to create the shapes presented above. The puzzles get harder the more levels you pass. Only the smart will pass them all.

Features:

• 300+ Levels
• 2 Game modes: Classic & 2 Lines
• Brain exercising game
• Easy to use controls
• 100% Free to Play!
